CargoShipSettings.name: cargoshipdynamic.cargoship_speed_scale
CargoShipSettings.description: Controls the speed of the Cargo Ship. Clamped to 5.

CargoShipSettings.name: cargoships.egress_duration_minutes
CargoShipSettings.description: Controls the time taken for the Cargo Ship to leave the map once its event has ended.

CargoShipSettings.name: cargoships.event_duration_minutes
CargoShipSettings.description: Controls the amount of time the Cargo Ship is active on the map for.

CargoShipSettings.name: cargoships.event_enabled
CargoShipSettings.description: Toggles the Cargo Ship event as a whole.

CargoShipSettings.name: cargoships.loot_round_spacing_minutes
CargoShipSettings.description: Controls how often Code Locked Crates spawn on the Cargo Ship.

CargoShipSettings.name: cargoships.loot_rounds
CargoShipSettings.description: Controls how many times Code Locked Crates spawn on the Cargo Ship.

CargoShipSettings.name: cargoships.scientist_onboard_check
CargoShipSettings.description: Toggles scientist spawning on the Cargo Ship.

CargoShipSettings.name: cargoships.spawncargoship
CargoShipSettings.description: Force spawns a Cargo ship, with normal event rules. Only one Cargo Ship can be on the map at the same time.

CargoShipSettings.name: cargoships.startegressing
CargoShipSettings.description: Forces the current Cargo Ship to leave the map, following the value set for egress_duration_minutes.
